Class FileComparator

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparator<IFile>
public class FileComparator
extends Object
implements Comparator<IFile>

IFile comparator.
Rules:
- directories first;
- other properties are based on parameters given in constructor, see FileComparator(IFileProvider.SortType, IFileProvider.SortOrder);

Since:
v1.91
Author:
Hai Bison
